ISSUE.TITLE: Bug: Use of space-bar in Shared grid view throws error
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: ### Please confirm if bug report does NOT exists already ? - [X] I confirm there is no existing issue for this ### Steps to reproduce ? - Open shared grid view link - Press space key Access control error - as space bar now tries to expand row ### Desired Behavior - No error ### Project Details Node: **v16.14.0** Arch: **arm64** Platform: **darwin** Docker: **false** Database: **mysql2** ProjectOnRootDB: **false** RootDB: **sqlite3** PackageVersion: **0.100.2** ### Attachements _No response_
